featured.title: Regenerative Coffee Waste Management in Wanja Kerssa
featured.tagline: Transforming environmental challenges into circular economy opportunities
challenges: Weak linkages between farmers, investors, and regulatory bodies
Outdated processing machines consuming excessive water
solutions: Construct larger lagoons to prevent overflow
Plant vetiver grass to filter and clean wastewater
Facilitate importation of modern processing machines
Establish a task force for implementation oversight
